content: good morning last night we all went to a club and I'm feeling a bit rough today perhaps I went a little crazy at the salty spatoon but it was Matt's 30th birthday on Friday so we all went out to a club to celebrate and we had a hoot and a holler I'll tell you what but now let me paint a picture of the future for you and trust me it's a beautiful picture like a warm comforting Thomas Kincade and just as soulless it's a future where your AI would do all of that for you it was something we went over on stream the CEO of bumble believes that the future of dating in particular is having two AIS date each other to see if you the human beings the [ __ ] cringe flesh puppets behind the AI are compatible and I was thinking about that this morning cuz like I said we went out last night now imagine I just sent my AI to do that like this is deep future [ __ ] we're getting to like Bruce Willis surrogates almost except I wouldn't be piloting it like a Gundam it would be just a literal Standalone AI that goes there on my behalf so it wears like my name tag I guess and somehow that's supposed to make meaningful connections I guess in the eyes of the Bumble CEO and I was just thinking about it it's like damn I could go have fun as a person or I could go meet people and form a connection or I could just have the AI do it and pretend that somehow that helps me and feels good the autonomous douchebag wouldn't even be communicating with other humans in this future if the Bumble CEO is correct here it would be communicating and mingling with other AI that represents other human beings it's putting people even deeper and deeper into complete isolation it's like the worst possible future in my eyes where AI infiltrates actually everything and replaces everything like soon we won't even have to piss and [ __ ] anymore we'll just have ai do it I'll just go on chat GPT and say [ __ ] for me okay I feel better now it's just it's so [ __ ] concerning but anyway not only did I go over like the Bumble CEO AI stance but we also found that there's Services being offered for dating apps that will flirt with others for you like completely without your input or anything it's an AI that you can train to emulate you so it can spit game on your behalf you have the ultimate wingman and by that I mean you have the worst possible wingman that will ensure that you will never get laid and if you already have had sex at some point in your life this [ __ ] service is so atrocious that it will give your virginity back if you try and unleash it on the dating apps that you use so I tried it on stream and let me show you some of the results for what it made for my profile I can only imagine the terror that it would inflict if you actually engage with it in a conversation but even just conceptually the whole idea of thinking that you're talking to a person but you're actually talking to AI in a romantic way is awful I hate it that sounds terrible and there's also another service it offers where it'll AI clean up your pictures so it'll make you prettier using AI it [ __ ] sucks oh you just reminded me about something how many of you saw the uh Bumble CEO saying the future of dating is by having your AI date other AIS to find your perfect match bumbles Whitney wolf herd says your dating AI concierge will soon date hundreds of other people's concierges for you and that'll find your perfect I hate these goddamn websites so that's so [ __ ] Hold on I got to find one that I can not only do you charge to access it but even when you accidentally make the mistake of going one of these dog [ __ ] cess pools you still get blasted with [ __ ] full page ads the future of dating could be filled with digital artificial intelligence powered personas setting each other up according to the founder the popular dating app Whitney wolf herd said that her company is considering how AI can assist and Empower women in their search for connection one particular use of AI that herd mentioned has gained traction online although not everyone liked the idea herd proposed a scenario in which singles could use AI dating concierges as stand-ins for themselves when reaching out to to prospective Partners online there is a world where your dating concierge could go and date for you with other dating concierge and then you don't have to talk to 600 people the use usage of AI is so confusing to me cuz all the places that AI makes so much sense to use for like actual tedious grunt work that would save actual workers so much trouble it's not being used for it's being used to like replace people and replace connection AI powered dating assistants have gotten more attention recently such as profile enhancers like your move. or simulated chat Bots like Valar your move. a what in the [ __ ] they have an AI rizer wait that's crazy dating apps are exhausting your move AI enhances your profile and texting turning your swipes into matches and matches into dates so you spend less time texting and More Time dating yeah so it's literally like it's catfishing you're just [ __ ] lying you just have ai spinning game for you if your game is so weak that you need chat G PT to do it for you you're not meant to date that person in the first place holy [ __ ] that's tragic I want to see you know let me see what kind of profile it makes me um answer a few questions get a free AI generated dating app profile tested and optimized for maximum success uh let's do it for Bumble since they love AI there I am a man I'm looking for something casual what do I enjoy doing in my free time uh I'm I enjoy playing Magic the Gathering uh basketball watching anime playing video games eating bananas uh what else do I like doing it about covers it if they can turn this into into something that gets a th000 matches then man it's worth every penny cuz this is doomed for failure what characteristics are you looking for in a partner anyone with a pulse really uh not super picky that's fine what unusual skill do you have I can eat onions like apples I can juggle I can win big prizes at carnivals with the standup beer bottle game I can do the Spongebob what's one thing on your bucket list uh get 1,000 matches on Bumble let's see if it can make that happen what do you enjoy talking about oh yeah garbage trucks is cool I like talking about garbage trucks Brendan Fraser true well actually hold on I'm not I'm not going to no no that's that's too easy for it that's going to make me [ __ ] awesome on there yeah aliens is good Flat Earth theories that's probably fine pick your writing style flirty for sure okay oh okay bud okay bud thanks your move. a what a waste of my [ __ ] time hey thanks for the free profile right up I just have to give you my credit card first for this first one to be free love that love that for us oh wait there's a no thanks option onion Enthusiast seeking someone who can handle a tear-free dinner date no crying about it just love for a good meal brother they're going to turn me into a [ __ ] Reddit thread and make fun of me for that kind of profile are you kidding me your move. AI more like no move stay lonely and a virgin forever are you kidding me that's their opening line for my [ __ ] profile they focused on the onion eating are you actual psychopath AI full-blown [ __ ] block oh wait you're right I can just roll I'm the guy who will win you a giant stuffed animal at the county fair and probably get us kicked out of the photo booth for making too many silly faces Jesus Christ oh my God it it thinks I'm a Discord mod Jesus if you're okay with a life of upscale Carnival dates and occasional public embarrassment I'm your guy on weekdays I'm stuck behind a screen but on weekends I'm All About The Thrill of the Midway I'm all about the drill of the Midway [ __ ] what I'll never get late again are there people that actually use this you think I feel like it's a lie I feel like no one's actually using your move. a I just don't believe it this there's no way this would actually spit game for you in an effective way unless you're also talking to another AI oh now this is [ __ ] up wait AI enhanced photos oh Jesus Christ they're monetizing professional catfishing banana Enthusiast seeking someone to share peels with I'm noticing a trend here this isn't the most advanced sophisticated AI it's pretty it's pretty uh rudimentary when I'm not working you can find me gaming or re-watching anime hopefully you can appreciate a good potassium filled joke why is it re-watching anime that makes me sound like even more of a loser Enthusiast is the only thing it knows no it knows two things I'm the guy that does the guy I'm a man of particular taste in my stomach thought what it's giving me IBS now if you're okay with the occasional waft of onion breath we might just have a connection is it getting mad at me these are just getting worse and worse I'm not entirely sure what's more ambitious getting a thousand matches or actually going on a date with one of them either way I'm hopefully you can help me solve this m it's just insulting me it's actually just insulting me like directly to me these aren't profiles it's speaking to me click the drop down button oh that's the about me let's see I'm known for making bad decisions eating onions like apples and winning your heart maybe with my sweet SpongeBob moves swipe right if you're not super picky and can handle a partner in crime who's a little rough around the edges why am I Rough Around the Edges I I my bio was pretty put together actually what the [ __ ] is this maybe it's because of bumbl maybe on Tinder it's more unhinged I'm not sure what's more impressive my trash can organization system or my ability to hold a conversation about garbage trucks for hours if you're looking for someone who can appreciate the little things I'm your guy now that's getting right back into the same [ __ ] over and over again I'm your guy pal there was an issue with our AI please wait a few minutes and try again well the issue is it sucks man that's the issue if you pay for that you deserve to be alone bro got rate limited to and they said oh my God he's way too desperate cut him off Quick Throttle them or simulated chat Bots like voer I don't really care to look at voer I already know what that's going to be it's just like an AI talking companion to like test your moves on the rise of generative AI can learn to mimic particular people has led to plenty of speculation around how it can be used in the Romantic Arena particularly some people have growing disillusion have growing disillusion with and given up on dating apps there's some healthy skepticism over whether AI is the answer a clip of heard at the Bloomberg Summit gained over 10 million views where people expressed uneasiness with the idea of an AI based dating scene some compared it to episodes of Black Mirror a Netflix series that explores dystopian uses of Technology others felt that the use of AI and dating would exacerbate the isolation and loneliness that people have been feeling in recent years you don't say herd said that she wants to use AI to teach people how to date better and create more healthy and Equitable relationships she suggests AI dating concierges can help people unpack their dating concerns and give tips for communicating with new matches it just does it for you that's not teaching them anything it's dating with the training wheels on and having someone else be you yeah if you want to get better at this go outside the last thing you want to do is stay even deeper inside and have an AI impersonate you we will not be dating camp in a few years dating will be a component but will be a true human connection platform this is where you will meet anyone you want to meet a hiking buddy um I still never learned how to say that word buddy whatever you're looking for I think it's maang I think is how you say it
title: AI is Replacing Dating
author: penguinz0

key_facts: The speaker attended a club celebration for Matt's 30th birthday last night.
The Bumble CEO, Whitney Wolfe Herd, proposed that AI dating concierges could date each other to find human matches.
AI services exist that generate dating profiles without user input.
Some AI tools enhance profile photos by making users appear more attractive.
AI can simulate conversations on dating apps based on user preferences.
The speaker tested an AI profile generator called 'Your Move.'
AI-generated profiles focus on unusual traits like eating onions like apples.
AI tools claim to turn swipes into matches and matches into dates.
One service uses AI to clean up and enhance user photos.
Another service simulates chat interactions to help users flirt.
AI profile generators ask users about hobbies, relationship preferences, and writing style.
The speaker found the AI-generated profile content absurd and self-deprecating.
AI tools are marketed as solutions to reduce time spent on dating app interactions.
AI is being used in dating apps despite concerns about authenticity and connection.
A clip from the Bloomberg Summit discussing AI in dating went viral with over 10 million views.
key_opinions: The idea of AI dating other AIs feels soulless and dystopian.
Using AI to replace human interaction in dating deepens social isolation.
AI-generated dating profiles are embarrassing and dehumanizing.
The concept of AI flirting on one’s behalf is morally questionable.
AI tools like 'Your Move' are worse than useless—they actively harm user credibility.
AI replacing genuine connection is the worst possible future for human relationships.
These AI services feel like catfishing disguised as convenience.
The use of AI in dating is a misuse of technology meant for real labor-saving purposes.
AI should not be used to teach people how to date—it should empower them to do it themselves.
AI concierges are training wheels that prevent real growth in emotional maturity.
The speaker distrusts the effectiveness of AI in creating meaningful romantic connections.
AI-enhanced photos represent monetized deception in online dating.
The speaker believes no one actually uses these AI tools seriously.
AI-generated bios are so extreme they risk ridicule and social rejection.
The entire trend reflects a cultural failure to engage authentically with others.
key_datapoints: The Bumble CEO’s vision involves AI concierges dating hundreds of other AI concierges.
The speaker tested an AI profile generator and received results within minutes.
One AI tool claims to increase match success rate for dating apps.
The speaker was rate-limited after multiple attempts to generate a profile.
A viral clip from the Bloomberg Summit gained over 10 million views.
AI profile generation requires answering questions about hobbies, preferences, and writing style.
The AI suggested the speaker describe himself as an 'onion enthusiast'.
The AI generated a goal of getting 1,000 matches on Bumble.
One AI tool offers photo enhancement using generative AI.
The speaker was prompted to provide credit card details for a free trial.
AI tools were described as having 'no move'—a play on the name 'Your Move'.
The AI recommended the speaker highlight his ability to win prizes at carnivals.
The AI suggested the speaker mention liking garbage trucks and Flat Earth theories.
The AI claimed to generate a profile optimized for maximum success.
The speaker noted the AI repeatedly emphasized 'rough around the edges' and 'SpongeBob moves'.
